title: Session expired whenever I attempt to buy RP on one of my LAN accounts
body:
^ title

I only get this error on one of my accounts, I've logged into smurfs and they all work perfectly fine.

https://gyazo.com/60158e5497c326bec34379e9a5be9a7c

https://gyazo.com/5847787d7cef6fdb6a16061e7aacbc82

replies.body: This error usually happens if a connection issue is struggling to communicate with the client's store panel.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help troubleshoot towards a fix.
Useless auto-reply, I have the same issue and other accounts work just fine. It's not a connection issue.

This is not helpful in the slightest...

How would a connection issue affect only one of my many accounts....
